title: Invest and manage rental properties more wisely with Mashvisor’s AI analytics, now $199.99
content:
Macworld

There’s a lot of opportunity in the current rental market but also a lot of risk, especially if you’re looking at properties outside your zip code. Mashvisor is a helpful tool rated “Excellent” on Trustpilot that allows investors to find high-performing houses and apartments quicker, and lifetime access to its Professional Plan is now open to new users for less than $200.

Pick any state and region within 95% of the United States, and Mashvisor can instantly highlight some of the top-performing areas and most attractive properties based on various factors, including properties’ Mashmeter score, rental revenue, cap rate, and crime rate. Users can even customize their rental property criteria, like location, budget, rental strategy, property type, and size, to find their match.

Once you find a possible investment location, check out its most up-to-date information from the MLS, Zillow, Rentometer, Airbnb.com, and the Census Bureau. All this data is then stored and processed by Mashvisor’s AI-driven analytics, including projected ROI and regulations, so you can take the guesswork out of your rental property hunt. 

Invest in rental properties more wisely with a lifetime subscription to Mashvisor’s Professional Plan for just $199.99.

 

Mashvisor: Lifetime Subscription (Professional Plan) – $199.99
